Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core

Class SceneCollection

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractMap<Integer,YaegerScene>
java.util.HashMap<Integer,YaegerScene>
java.util.LinkedHashMap<Integer,YaegerScene>
com.github.hanyaeger.core.SceneCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable, Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Integer,YaegerScene>, SequencedMap<Integer,YaegerScene>
public class SceneCollection extends LinkedHashMap<Integer,YaegerScene> implements Initializable
A SceneCollection contains all instances of YaegerScene that are part of a Game. It is responsible for initializing all the scenes and setting the current YaegerScene.
See Also:

      public SceneCollection(javafx.stage.Stage stage, YaegerConfig yaegerConfig)

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • addScene

      public void addScene(int id, YaegerScene scene)
      Add a YaegerScene to the collection of SceneCollection. A YaegerScene uses a number (Integer) to be identified. Each number can be only used one time.
      Parameters:
      id - the int identifying the YaegerScene
      scene - the YaegerScene to be added

    • getActiveScene

      public YaegerScene getActiveScene()
      Return the YaegerScene currently active.
      Returns:
      the YaegerScene that is currently active

    • setActive

      public void setActive(int id)
      Set the YaegerScene of the given int. The set YaegerScene will be shown and if available its GameLoop and EventListeners will be active.
      Parameters:
      id - the int identifying the YaegerScene

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.
